title: Social Media Marketing Manager
job_overview:
???? We're Hiring: Marketing Manager

Are you a strategic marketer with a creative edge and a passion for digital innovation? We're looking for a Marketing Manager with extensive knowledge and hands-on experience in Marketing and Digital Marketing to lead and grow our brand presence across digital platforms.

If you're driven by results, thrive in fast-paced environments, and know how to turn insights into action — this role is for you.

???? What You’ll Do:

? Strategy & Planning

Develop and implement comprehensive digital and social media strategies aligned with business objectives.
Set SMART goals (Specific, Measurable, Attainable, Realistic, Time-bound) on a quarterly and annual basis.
Conduct market research to understand audience behavior, trends, and platform opportunities.
Identify trending content formats, hashtags, and digital tools to enhance reach and engagement.
Regularly audit current strategies, run A/B testing, and stay updated with the latest in digital marketing.

? Content Creation & Campaign Management

Lead the planning and execution of high-performing content across multiple platforms.
Collaborate with writers, designers, and internal teams to ensure cohesive brand messaging.
Oversee the creation of engaging visuals, posts, reels, videos, and stories.
Ensure brand consistency, copyright compliance, and content optimization.

? Community Engagement & Customer Interaction

Actively manage and engage with online communities across platforms.
Respond to messages, inquiries, and comments in a timely and professional manner.
Monitor and manage brand reputation, including spam prevention and crisis communication.

? Paid Advertising & Growth Strategy

Plan and manage targeted ad campaigns across platforms like Facebook, Instagram, Google, and more.
Conduct A/B testing, audience targeting, and ROI analysis to continuously optimize performance.
Track competitor activity and implement strategies to gain a competitive edge.

? Analytics & Performance Tracking

Monitor key performance metrics across all marketing channels.
Generate reports to assess success and areas for improvement.
Use insights to adjust strategies and ensure campaigns deliver measurable results.
Analyze website traffic and user behavior to recommend enhancements.

???? Job Requirements:

Extensive knowledge and hands-on experience in Marketing and Digital Marketing (minimum 3–5 years preferred)
Strong understanding of social media platforms, SEO/SEM, content strategy, and digital trends
Proven track record of managing successful paid advertising campaigns and community growth
Experience with analytics tools such as Google Analytics, Meta Business Suite, and Ad Manager
Excellent copywriting and communication skills
Proficient with design tools (e.g., Canva, Adobe Creative Suite)
Familiarity with AI tools and automation in marketing is a strong advantage
Strong organizational and time management skills
Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a team environment

???? Benefits:

Paid Time Off (PTO) - (Upon Reaching 6 Months)
Holiday Pay - (Upon Reaching 6 Months)
Ongoing training and opportunities for professional development
Supportive, innovative, and collaborative work culture
Opportunity to lead and shape the company’s marketing direction
